application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 83 (Noise - Unit 2) of planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2021/751, dated 10/11/2021 (Section 73 application seeking a variation to Condition 61 (Approved Drawings) of planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2019/1666 dated 11-09-20 (Section 73 application to vary Condition 9 (Residential Condition - Approved Plans) of planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883 dated 28/06/2018 (Part demolition of existing factory buildings and associated structures, and redevelopment to provide residential dwellings (Use Class C3), office, retail, community and leisure uses (Use Class A1/A3/A4/B1/B8/D1/D2), commercial floorspace (Use Classes B1c/B2/B8) and Data Centre (Sui Generis), amenity and playspace, landscaping, allotments, access, service yards, associated car parking and other engineering works) (as amended by application ref: 1331/APP/2020/50 dated 06/02/20)).
decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application grants the partial discharge of Condition 83 (Noise) attached to planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2021/751 in relation to Unit 2 only, and not Units 1, 3 and 4 which are the subject of separate applications pursuant to Condition 83 and which will be the subject of separate decision notices.

Condition 83 (Noise) shall be fully discharged once the separate partial discharge notices have been issued pursuant to Condition 83 (Noise) in respect of Units 1, 3 and 4 which will allow the occupation of all four units with the plant and machinery assessed to date. A further post installation noise assessment shall be submitted if required in the circumstances mentioned below.

If any further plant or machinery beyond that assessed to date by the Plant Noise Impact Assessment and Landlord Plant Noise Commissioning Report listed in the attached schedule of Plans, then further details shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in accor
